content: Then the  became jealous for his land,
In response to his people the  said:
and I will no more make you
your sons and your daughters shall prophesy,
Even on the male and female slaves,
I will show portents in the heavens and on the earth, blood and fire and columns of smoke.
The sun shall be turned to darkness, and the moon to blood, before the great and terrible day of the  comes.

Then everyone who calls on the name of the  shall be saved; for in Mount Zion and in Jerusalem there shall be those who escape, as the  has said, and among the survivors shall be those whom the  calls.
